experience.title: Public Relations Manager
experience.description: Organizing events for the employees (celebrations, trainings, meetings); Promoting Internships; Internal and External communication

experience.title: Public Relations Officer
experience.description: Organizing events for the employees; promoting the organization development strategy; maintaining a good level of satisfaction at work; promoting new services offered by La Poste to important clients in the region; animate intranet; writing articles for Jourpost; press releases; sales pitches to heads of departments.

experience.title: Public Relations Officer
experience.description: Contributed to organize the annual fair event PAPIER 2007; find artists, catering, spot; promoted AGAC to find sponsors to support the Association during the annual recurrent fair event Papier; suggested a marketing strategy plan to appeal to private as well as public donors.

experience.title: Photography Assistant
experience.description: Manage the archives of photos; analyse the new photographs to be bought or rejected; communicate with the photographers.

experience.title: Promotions/Marketing Assistant
experience.description: Promote the school to prospective students; communicate with future students; organize the interviews order; provide assistance to the jury; manage the supply stocks for the event; participate in tours of the city.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Project management responsibilities related to Gestion Lastchance.

experience.title: Regional Communication Manager
experience.description: Develop and follow the executive communication strategy for all the Chambers; press relations (advertising campaigns, press kits, press releases); events (speech writing, managing service providers); drafting corporate and executive communication media; define with a graphic agency the new signature of the CRMA PACA and roll it out to all of the Chambers.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Marketing Communications
Master of Science in Change Management (Human Resources)
